instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01041 wont boot
threads.message:
Hi, got an 820-01041 that wont boot. It will get stuck on apple logo or somethings just blank. It wont boot from external USB either. A few times ive managed to get it to connect to wifi only to get stuck there. DFU doesnt fix it. 

The board looks in pristine condition.

threads.title: 820-01041 wont boot
threads.message:
May have a GPU problem.
Also gets stuck if try to start in diagnostic mode?

threads.title: 820-01041 wont boot
threads.message: No response when using D or Option+D. Just stuck on logo

threads.title: 820-01041 wont boot
threads.message:
Check if goes into target disk mode.
If yes, test its SSD.

threads.title: 820-01041 wont boot
threads.message:
"DFU doesnt fix it."
Do you mean it completes DFU restore without error?

threads.title: 820-01041 wont boot
threads.message: Restore works most of the time but revive device gives error.
